title: What's a Champ You Think is Perfectly Designed?
body:
Every Champ has some  BS mechanic, strong or not. Riven is Riven. Vayne has % HP true damage. Yasuo has his windwall. Syndra's ult 1-shots you. Annie's 1-shots your team. Maokai never dies. Nasus never gives a fuck. Even Brand has a 2 second stun starting at rank 1.

So what Champ do you think is a flawless design?

Mine goes for this guy {{champion:201}} :

Passive: You have time to react to it, even with synergistic lanes like Lucian. There's room to outplay on both sides.

Q: Skillshot actually makes this a good ability for both sides; it's not overbearing when it lands and it's not a major letdown when it misses.

W: About the closest thing you can get to free stats while actually making it an interactive ability that meshes well with his kit

E: While similar to Yasuo's, I feel it's more fitting on him, and since it can be planned around moreso in skirmishes and teamfights instead of duels, I think it's fine on him. It also doesnt get to be as wide. 

R: I see nothing wrong with it, just seems like a good ability.

So what about you guys? What's that one Champ that you think just has a good kit with nothing "bs" about it?
